# pgfsr

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

pgfsr is an R client to [pg_featureserv](https://github.com/CrunchyData/pg_featureserv), a RESTful web service that provides access to spatial data stored in PostGIS tables, as well as spatial processing capability based on PostGIS spatial functions.

## Installation

You can install the development version of pgfsr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("poissonconsulting/pgfsr")
```
